title: Circle Wins ADGM License, Taps Former Visa Executive to Lead Middle East Push
contentSnippet: The approval positions Circle to offer regulated payment services in Abu Dhabi as the UAE accelerates its oversight of crypto.

title: Zcash Floats Dynamic Fee Plan to Ensure Users Won’t Be Priced Out
contentSnippet: ZEC zoomed 12% amid the fee discussion, beating gains across all major tokens.

title: Ninth Defendant Pleads Guilty in $263M Crypto Social-Engineering Scheme
contentSnippet: Evan Tangeman acknowledged helping launder at least $3.5 million for the SE Enterprise group, along with turning stolen crypto into bulk cash.

title: USDC Issuer Circle Secures Abu Dhabi's ADGM License in Middle East Expansion
contentSnippet: The license allows Circle to expand USDC payment and settlement tools across the United Arab Emirates.

title: Bitcoin Slips Toward ETF Break-Even Level as Inflows Slow, but Support May Be Building
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is drifting back toward the price where ETF buyers break even, as inflows slow and investors look to the Fed’s decision this week.

title: HashKey launches Hong Kong IPO, seeking up to $215 million
contentSnippet: HashKey plans to use a large portion of the proceeds for tech and infrastructure upgrades, market expansion and ecosystem partnerships.

title: ETH, ADA, SOL Steady as Timezone Data Shows Europe Drove Deepest Bitcoin Selloff Since 2018
contentSnippet: The broader market held its recent rebound, though liquidity remained thin ahead of Wednesday’s Federal Reserve decision.

title: Tether gains Abu Dhabi’s approval to expand USDT use across nine major chains
contentSnippet: Licensed firms in Abu Dhabi Global Market can now conduct activities involving USDT on chains such as Aptos, Celo and Cosmos.

title: Dogecoin Holds $0.14 Floor as Network Activity Hits 3-Month High
contentSnippet: Rising active addresses and tightening volatility indicate an impending directional move, with $0.16 as a critical breakout threshold.

title: Bitcoin Traders Target $20K Bitcoin Strike as Deep Out of the Money Options Gain Traction
contentSnippet: These flows represent a bullish bet on volatility rather than a downside hedge or outright bearish position.

title: XRP Traders Eyes Breakout Above $2.11 as U.S. ETFs Cross $1B Milestone
contentSnippet: A breakout above $2.11 is needed to trigger momentum towards higher resistance levels, while failure to hold $2.00 could lead to a retest of $1.95.

title: ChatGPT Helps Expose a $1 Million Crypto 'Pig-Butchering' Scam
contentSnippet: An online romance led a Bay Area woman to drain her retirement accounts, only for an AI assistant to later warn her it was a scam.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: BTC Steadies Around 90k With Liquidity Drained and a Fed Cut Fully Priced In
contentSnippet: QCP notes participation has collapsed while Polymarket sees a shallow easing path, putting the focus on guidance and cross central bank signals.

title: HashKey Files for Hong Kong IPO, Aims to Be City’s First Listed Crypto Exchange
contentSnippet: Hashkey's filing shows its push to anchor institutional crypto infrastructure in Hong Kong as the city bolsters its digital assets oversight.

title: 22-year-old pleads guilty to money laundering for $263 million crypto syndicate
contentSnippet: Tangeman assisted the scheme by using a bulk-cash converter to exchange the stolen crypto into cash, which was used to obtain rental homes.

title: Sen. Moreno calls crypto bill talks ‘decently frustrating’ as Senate races toward year-end goal posts
contentSnippet: Negotiations on a crypto bill have been "decently frustrating" over the past few weeks, Ohio Republican Sen. Bernie Moreno said.

title: Tether Invests in Italian Robotics Startup Generative Bionics Amid Humanoid Hype
contentSnippet: Stablecoin issuer Tether has joined an $81 million round as humanoid robotics draws increasing investor interest.

title: CFTC clears path for ETH, Bitcoin and USDC to be used as collateral in derivatives markets
contentSnippet: The move builds on a CFTC initiative in September expanding the use of tokenized collateral, particularly stablecoins, in derivatives markets.

title: CFTC to Pilot Tokenized Collateral in Derivatives Markets Starting With Bitcoin, Ethereum and USDC
contentSnippet: The CFTC has introduced a pilot allowing Bitcoin, Ethereum, and USDC to be used as margin, while updating rules to support tokenized assets.

title: CFTC Launches Digital Assets Pilot Allowing Bitcoin, Ether and USDC as Collateral
contentSnippet: Acting Chair Caroline Pham has unveiled a first-of-its-kind U.S. program to permit tokenized collateral in derivatives markets, citing "clear guardrails" for firms.

title: Tether joins $80 million funding round for Italian humanoids built for high-risk industrial jobs
contentSnippet: The deal deepens Tether’s push into AI and robotics, following recent investments in brain-computer interfaces and GPU infrastructure.

title: Crypto Markets Flash Green, But Bitcoin and Ethereum Are in a Death Cross: Analysis
contentSnippet: Markets open in green after a week of recovery, but the movement isn't enough to call it bullish yet. The death cross looms large over both Bitcoin and Ethereum.

title: Bitcoin Treads Water Near $90K as Bitfinex Warns of 'Fragile Setup' to Shocks
contentSnippet: BTC's relative weakness compared to stocks points to tepid spot demand, making the largest crypto vulnerable to macro volatility, Bitfinex analysts said.

title: U.S. Regulator Pushes Back on Banks Fighting Crypto's Pursuit of Trust Charters
contentSnippet: Comptroller of the Currency Jonathan Gould spoke at an industry event in Washington, arguing that the OCC won't resist crypto because of banker complaints.

title: Binance Suspends Employee That Used Official X Account to Promote BNB Chain Token
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange Binance has disciplined an employee after they used a brand account to promote the launch of a meme coin they helped create.

title: HYPE token treasury Hyperliquid Strategies rolls out $30 million stock repurchase program
contentSnippet: Hyperliquid Strategies, which filed for a $1 billion shelf registration in October to fund its HYPE treasury, approved a stock repurchase program.

title: Bitcoin ETF Giant BlackRock Files to Launch Ethereum Staking ETF
contentSnippet: Investment firm BlackRock filed the S-1 registration statement for a new Ethereum staking ETF, ETHB, separate from its existing ETHA fund.

title: The Daily: Robinhood’s expansion plans, BlackRock’s staked Ethereum ETF filing, Strategy’s biggest Bitcoin buy since July, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: BitMine reports $13.2 billion in holdings as ETH treasury expands after November slowdown
contentSnippet: Tom Lee said BitMine is seeing improving market conditions roughly eight weeks after October’s liquidation shock.

title: Binance post confirming insider trading sends ‘year of the yellow fruit’ meme token even higher
contentSnippet: The suspected token, called "year of the yellow fruit," was promoted using official Binance channels just seconds after it was issued onchain.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
